data.Title: Google Search Console Links Report Fixed
data.Description: Google has resolved issues with the Search Console links report, potentially restoring accuracy to backlink data. Link counts have been restored in Google Search Console after a bug caused them to drop for some sites.

data.Title: Google to De-Index Mobile-Inaccessible Sites After July 5th
data.Description: Google announces that websites inaccessible on mobile devices will be de-indexed after July 5th, marking a significant step in mobile-first indexing. Google reiterates its commitment to mobile-first indexing, stating that websites inaccessible on mobile devices will be removed from the index after July 5th.

data.Title: Google Expands Keyword Options for Popular Products
data.Description: Google expands its keyword options for popular products, potentially impacting product listing visibility. Google is expanding keyword options for popular products, potentially affecting product visibility in search results.

data.Title: Google Updates Privacy Policies for Ads and Analytics Users
data.Description: Google informs advertisers and analytics users about upcoming changes due to new privacy laws in certain US states. Google sends an email to advertisers and analytics users outlining changes in response to new privacy laws being implemented in some US states.

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Testing New Chat Features
data.Description: Google Business Profiles may soon allow businesses to add SMS or WhatsApp numbers to their chat section. Speculation that Google Business Profiles will soon allow businesses to include SMS or WhatsApp numbers in their chat section.

data.Title: Perplexity Pages Gaining Visibility in Google Search
data.Description: Perplexity Pages are appearing in Google's AI Overviews and featured snippets, potentially signaling a shift in search results. Data from BrightEdge indicates that Google's AI Overviews are becoming less visible, appearing for only 15% of search queries.

data.Title: Google Search Ranking Algorithm Updated
data.Description: Google has updated its search ranking algorithm, with a focus on Core Web Vitals. Sites that were negatively impacted by the October 2023 update saw further drops in rankings.

data.Title: Search Central Launches LinkedIn Page
data.Description: Google's Search Central is now on LinkedIn, providing announcements, news, and more.

data.Title: Bing Celebrates 15th Anniversary
data.Description: Bing celebrated its 15th anniversary, with reflections on its impact on search and its role in keeping LLMs fresh and grounded.

data.Title: Walmart Launches 3D Ecommerce Platform Realm
data.Description: Walmart has launched Realm, a 3D ecommerce platform that offers a video game-like shopping experience, targeting Gen Z.

data.Title: Amazon Developing AI Agent "MultiOn"
data.Description: Amazon is reportedly developing an AI agent called MultiOn, which could compete with other AI agents in the market.

data.Title: Google Gemini May Integrate with Spotify
data.Description: Google's Gemini AI chatbot may soon have a Spotify extension, allowing users to control Spotify with voice commands.

data.Title: Microsoft Advertising Transitions to Performance Max
data.Description: Microsoft Advertising is transitioning Smart Shopping campaigns to Performance Max, its automated campaign type.

data.Title: Brave Launches Search Ads Platform
data.Description: Brave launches its own search advertising platform after 18 months of testing.

data.Title: Competition Heats Up in AI Video Generation Market
data.Description: Increased competition in the AI video generation market poses a challenge to OpenAI's Sora.
